Player History
Earned first career win on 4/28/1977...
Traded from Texas to Cleveland on 5/24/1980 (Going to TEX: P M. Smithson, P C. Puleo, P K. Stanfield. Going to CLE: 2B D. Oliver, P N. Chavez)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1981, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Oakland in 1987...
Injured on 8/21/1988 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...

Injured on 7/27/1989 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...

Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1990, off Alejandro Pena (DET)...
Injured on 7/13/1990 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
